'From 3 Vlaamse regeringspartijen samen hebben ruim 160.000 extra behaald stemmen en hebben nu een meerderheid'
'We staan ​​klaar om eleven verantwoordelijkheid te nemen respect voor eleven waarden en engagementen'

Whatever our candidates for the presidency, the last thing we will worry about is the AK Party's future.
The AK Party is a party that has existed and will exist with principles, rather than individuals, with certain policies, litigation and morality.
Ahmet came to the party's head and Mehmet came to argue that it is the greatest disrespect to the cause and action.
Who is in a great arrogance if he says 'I will not be the case if I am not.' Who says, 'If it does not happen then it will not be a case.'
